front.title: RTP Payload Format for SMPTE 336M Encoded Data

abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism for carriage of KLV (Key-Length- Value) Encoded Data, as defined by the Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE) in SMPTE 336M. One payload format is described for transmitting KLV Encoded Data on a separate RTP session dedicated for the transmission of KLV Encoded Data.
